channel.title: Star Wars Conversion
channel.description:
Wondering if anyone is interested in teaming up for a Star Wars conversion of RSC? We'd need a couple of dedicated coders (Myself included) and a pixel Artist. Here are my ideas so far.
Melee >> Stays the same, swaps weapons around to things such as vibroblades, lightsabers etc Range >> Becomes Marksmanship, weapons become Blaster Rifles. Mage >> Becomes The Force, Spells become all sorts of force attacks from star-wars.
Could be set in the Old Republic or the New Republic. New would mean the Trade Federation, Empire and Rebels or an alternative Trade Federation and Republic. Old would mean the Sith and the old Republic. Npc's would be changed accordingly.
Instead of ships an NPC would ask where you'd like to travel and for some money you could fly to a new world. Old republic would give us worlds like Tarris and some other old ones. New would mean Tatooine and Hoth etc.

item.title: Star Wars Conversion
item.dc:creator: @xEnt xEnt
item.description:
@xEnt wrote:

i was running through a build plan in my head today for 10 mins or so thinking if i should waste some time making a pokescape or not.

My idea would be something like

stealing that ‘bush’ sprite on gameboy pokemon (how u walk around the bushes and bump into pokemon) and getting someone on a landscape editor to make bush spawns all over the RSC world, containing a few pokemon, their levels)

then making a pokedex and fighting etc.

Since it’s too much work getting the pokemon sprites to show as an in game NPC. maybe people could catch pokemon and skin their pokemon as whatever sprite they wanted (man, goblin etc) but the name will still be the pokemon name, level etc. just appearance is different.

but yeah theres so much to discuss if i were to go ahead with this, would need a lot of help from any people, i would only use the first 150 pokemon and this would only happen if a lot of interest was shown.

edit: for kicks i’m going to pull up the map editor and try and create pallett town using http://www.vgmaps.com/Atlas/GB-GBC/Pokemon-RBY-Kanto.png as a reference.

Read full topic
